refnamediv.refpurpose: Updates the Palm ToDo list with one new entry.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: install-todo allows the user to install one new ToDo list entry with specified paramters passed to install-todo and add a Note entry using text found in a filename <filename> passed to install-todo.

listitem.para: Specify the priority of the ToDo entry - 1|2|3|4|5 (defaults to a priority of 1).
NOTE: this value has changed from the default of 4 to the default of 1, just as a new ToDo entry on the Palm would set it.
The due Date MM/DD/YYYY (defaults to blank, no due date if this is not specified).
Mark the item complete (the default is to mark the item as incomplete, as the Palm would do it).
The title of the ToDo entry
The Note text you wish to add to this ToDo entry, if any.
A local filename containing the Note text.

Use device file <port> to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, install-todo will look for the $PILOTPORT environment variable. If neither are found or supplied, install-todo will print the usage information.
Display version of install-todo and exit without connecting.
Display the help synopsis for install-todo and exit without connecting.
Display a brief usage message and exit without connecting.

refsect1.title: Usage
refsect1.para: The program will connect to a target Palm handheld, and creates the ToDo entry to the Palm ToDo application, using the specified parameters and input from the supplied file passed as arguments on the commandline.
